version_description: New homepage design: more convenient to use Conversation Translation and Camera Translation.

1. A new word game! Improve your vocabulary with this funny Word Fishing Game.
2. More accurate translations for Tamil, French, Telugu, Portuguese and Arabic.
3. More authoritative sources for word definitions. A new Indonesian dictionary was added.
4. Bug fixes.
Bug fixes

Offline Dictionary:Free download of Offline Packages 38 languages.
History Records:Search words more quickly by clicking history records.

Offline Dictionary:Free download of Offline Packages 38 languages.
History Records:Search words more quickly by clicking history records.

Pronunciation settings: Support changing the pronunciation of words and sentences in the app. Choose your favorite voice and speed.
Download Optimization: Download the offline dictionary more stably.
Odia dictionary:Search Odia (Oriya) words online or offline.

Push daily featured articles and content in time.
Bug fixes and experience optimizes.

Push daily featured articles and content in time.
Bug fixes and experience optimizes.
Now you can translate quickly by using camera.
Now you can translate quickly by using camera.

Greatly upgraded the translation feature:
1. Text Translation: Translate between any two languages from 108 languages.
2. Conversation Translation: Simultaneous interpretation between 28 accents, 17 languages
3. Camera Translation: Snap a photo with text to get it translated. Recognizes 12 languages.

1. A brand new column- Aha Moment! Enjoy daily quotes with beautiful pictures. You can also share them with your friends!
2. More columns: an interesting video column, Kaleidoscope and a new column for comics.
3. More accurate translations for Japanese and Hindi.

Official Oxford Dictionaries Inside. Try now for free! Oxford dictionaries in 12 languages. Equipped with a huge number of word definitions and sample sentences, U-Dictionary is more authoritative than ever.

We proudly present the BRAND NEW V4.0:
· More Simple: Translate more efficiently! No more articles and videos on the homepage.
· More Powerful:
· Object Translation, recognizing object in one glimpse.
· Grammar Check, your best writing aide.
· Offline Mode, translating anytime, anywhere.
· New UI and better experience.

If you like our app, please write a review on the App Store. Also if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at udictionary01@gmail.com.
